    public class MainActivity
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
implements Notification, android.support.v4.widget.SwipeRefreshLayout.OnRefreshListener
    First activity displayed when the application is launched. Implements the Notification Interface, allowing him to react to other classes demands Created by GroupeProjetDLNApp on 23/12/16.
